title: Awesome List Updates on Jun 12, 2022

items.title: Awesome Home Assistant
items.content_text:
### Dashboards / Custom Cards

*   [Vacuum Card (⭐1k)](https://github.com/denysdovhan/vacuum-card) - A card to card for controlling a vacuum cleaner robot.
*   [Purifier Card (⭐312)](https://github.com/denysdovhan/purifier-card) - A card for controlling air purifiers.
items.content_html:
Dashboards / Custom Cards

  • Vacuum Card (⭐1k) - A card to card for controlling a vacuum cleaner robot.
  • Purifier Card (⭐312) - A card for controlling air purifiers.

items.title: Awesome Dotnet
items.content_text:
### API

*   [WTelegramClient (⭐1.2k)](https://github.com/wiz0u/WTelegramClient) - Automate a user account on Telegram, using the latest version of [Telegram Client API](https://core.telegram.org/methods)
items.content_html:
API

  • WTelegramClient (⭐1.2k) - Automate a user account on Telegram, using the latest version of Telegram Client API

items.title: Awesome Db Tools
items.content_text:
### IDE

*   [Sql Server Management Studio](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/sql/ssms/sql-server-management-studio-ssms) - SQL Server Management Studio (SSMS) is an integrated environment for managing any SQL infrastructure, for SQL Server and Azure SQL Databases.
items.content_html:
IDE

  • Sql Server Management Studio - SQL Server Management Studio (SSMS) is an integrated environment for managing any SQL infrastructure, for SQL Server and Azure SQL Databases.

items.title: Awesome ad Free
items.content_text:
### Alternatives / Communication

*   [Wire](https://wire.com/en/resources/whitepapers/privacy/) - Text, audio, and video communication with end-to-end encryption.
items.content_html:

  • Wire - Text, audio, and video communication with end-to-end encryption.

items.title: Awesome Mac
